text: thawath eka bodin karayek.

shri lanka- engalantha tharangayath suwisheshayi..eya shri lankawa jayaganime sambhawithawaya wadi namuth, engalanthaya me tharangawaliya pura dakwu peraliwala hatiyata, kisiseth tharangaya suluwen thakanna baha..
ko ara lalla lala.......

ee uthurumada saha sabaragamuwa palath sabha wisuruwa harima pilibandawa sakachcha kirimataya.e.ja.pa nayaka ranil wika්ramasinha giya sathiyedi uthurumada saha sabaragamuwa yana palath sabha sandaha e.ja.pa mathiwarana wyaparaya meheyawimata kamitu dekak path kaleya.sabaragamuwa palath mathiwaranaye e.ja.pa mulika pa්racharaka wyaparaya meheyawimata e.ja.pa manthi්rawaru wana rawindra samarawira, e.ja.pa madhya pa්rakashaka gayantha karunathilaka, ranjith madduma bandara pathkota thibe.uthurumada palathe e.ja.pa mathiwarana satana meheyawima lakshman kirialla, upali samarawira, ranjith athapaththu saha themiya hurulle path kota thibe.giya sathiyedi jathika nidahas peramuna hadisi deshapalana mandala raswimak kandawa thibini.
ee 1978 wasare ekthara dinayaki.

shri lanka aayojana mandalaya chinayehi shri lanka thanapathi karyalaya ha ekwa mema awasthawata sahabhagi wemin shri lankawe pibidena aayojana awastha dakwena pradarshana kutiyak saha aayojana sammanthranayak sanwidhanaya karana ladi.
melahatta mawa sindi walinuth elawala athi.
me weddi hoda pasasumak labila thiyenawa katha malawata.
dan unath naraka natha.
balala iwara unata passe thama adahasak denna wenne.
hemas hospitl, gold jel, klogad me tika thama mama danata nawaththala thiyena dewal.
hithaganna baha me tharam sanwedi wenne ayi?
kamkaru departhamenthuwe anekuth ansha magin sapayana sewa
jiwithe gana mata hithena hati mama kalin post ekakath katha kala.....
ithin loha kara palandana oona tharam thibenna athi lokaye palamu wathawatath.
widyagnyayin wishwasa karanne aarakshakari wimata awashya wu wita thama mawa thadin grahanaya karaganima ape muthun miththangen uruma wu prawesamkari swabhawayak bawayi.
ranil ada balayen umathu wela.
eda man poragen ahawwa mehema.
ada liyanna yanne me lipi pelahi awasana lipiya.
kelawara aasanna wathma awakashaye swarupayan mehema rekhiya naha.
agosthu 23 wani da sita lowapura thiragatha wana kresi rich eeshiyans da kalin thiragatha wu sinamapata deka menma boks ofis wartha pihituwamin thiragatha weyi.
mage hitha paththu wi yanawa se mata danuni.
minis swabhawaya anuwa penima wadagath wenne da naha.
kohomada gold fish kiyala band ekak thawa awuruddak wage athulatha lankawema katha wenna gaththama…..

eheth ema siduwimen pasuwa tharunayan dedena biyata pathwa athi athara eya sathya washayenma merata samanya janayage prakashanaye nidahasatath, podu janaya rajya kriyakarithwaya wetha dakwana prathichara adapana kirimatath hethuwimak we.
meya mithyawakya: kalaya ikmawa giya wita, mema hangim ha unanduwa kramayen kramayenma eewata wati atha.

eekabadda wipakshaya wisin ‘yahapalana top ten’ wadasatahana yatathe gonu karanu labu thunwana paminilla ada dinaye amathi malik samarawika්ramata erehiwa allas ho dushana wimarshana komishan sabhawata bara denu labiya.
shri lankan guwan sewaya thama sannama thanapathiwariya washayen boliwud nili jakalin fardinandas samaga giwisumakata elambaa athayi warthawe.
deshapalakayinta awashya wanne nithimaya balayata paminimata athadiga hara wiyadam kirimata mudalmaya balayayi .
oba samiyage bimath kama nisa pida widiyida?
samagamen kaluwarata da...
ayi unmada chithrasena la nadda ape rate?
sanskruthiyata mewani kriya thuli pahara di athi bawa da kiya siti unwahanse maha nayaka himiyanta pirikara ras nokara me sambandhayen kriyamargayan ganna lesa pawasana bawa da sandahan kaleya.
mama yana pudgalaya, saththwaya yana panchaskandhaya bihi wuye ayi?
ee atharama, bitkoyin brahaspathinda sita sikurada dakwa amarikanu dolar 9.550 dakwa ihala giyeya.
kochchara balaporoththu purogena athda. ?
hata ganan wala arambaunu janasathu kirime wyaparaya haththawa dashakaye itha wegayen siduwuna.
ithin eya mema tharunayata nil chithrapata wala raga pamata aaradhana kara athi athara, ohuge ragapam walata ihala prathichara himi wu nisa ohuwa digatama ee kshethraye thabagena atha.
mahinda rajapaksha rajaya samaye di janapathi karyalaye wahana awabhawitha karamin rajayata rupiyal laksha 50ka paduwak kalayi rimand bharaye siti manthri jayantha samara...
api adhyayanaya kala liyakiyawili nam siddhi anupiliwelawal wenas...
nawa nishpadana welandapalata handunwadime di yoda ganima.
mulinma mayikal prannandu mahatha gedarin uyagena aa bath parsal panahak pamana sisunta bedannata hamudawa samaga dadi wag praharayaka yedi awasara gaththeya.
sattikuta pretha kathawa
eyin mata hondata mathaka kathawak thamayi "raththaran dath"...
habayi ithin samahara ayata nam torant epawela athi.
ema nisama wijaya namathi deshapalana sadhakaya deshapalana bhumikawen iwath kirima sandaha wairayen sasala wu adhirajya gathi dhanapathi panthiyath idam himi radalayanuth kumanthranaya kalaha.
sapala karagatha nohaki ilakka gana athiwana anawashya sithiwili nisa thamayi siyayata 90k denata diyawadiyawa athi wanne.
ewita ti.di silwa mama ohuge gedarata aa bawath wiejwira samaga katha kala ayuruth rathri bhojanayata sahabhagi wu andamath kiya hitiya.
mewa siyalla boru mawapamya.
ewapu thagi kandarawa.
rasikayan hatiyatane natya hadanne.
oya yuthopiya darshana rashiyaka podu durwalakamak.
undata dan pare yanna pana naha...
eheth emagin pa්rashnaya wisandeda?
mokada diseptikansla nawatha awith.
"ayi oya mehema aawe?
paminena hamotama wadasatahane widiyo thatiyakuth labenawa....
ehema mokuth mathak wenneth na.
me athara mannarama disthrikkaye me wanawita warthawi athi chandaya prakasha kirime prathishathaya siyayata 30 k.
mama hithanawa oyala mata me sayit ekata wagema ee fan pej eka karagena yanna udaw karayi kiyala.
rajya lama natya ulele awasan natya 28 ...
mamanam ee rasayata aasayi.
stok engalanthaya wenuwen test tharaga 25kata sahabhagiwi lakunu 1429k raskaragena athiathara bidahela athi kadulu sankyawa 60k.
me sandaha mudal sapayima saha sambandhikaranaya karana ladde landan warjiniya kompani nam wu samagamayi.
budi ‘balu’ padaya gana katha nokaranne meya boho katha kala padayak wana bawini.
punchi dinusha pohora urayak tharam loku thama pasal poth mallata atha yawa ohuge sihin agili thudu eha meha yawamin ee sundara wasthuwa ehi athi bawa awasan warata...
thaman nodanna yamak athoth danneku athin asa danagena ho kriya kirimaya.
jathyanthara muslim lokaya thula ithama janapriya dawantha charithayak “yusuf al kardawi.
mage mawage diyawadiya roga thaththwayata sidu kerena paryeshanawala wartha satahan karanne kopi pothakaya.
pahu giya dawas wala disple eke podi awulak thibuna.
mewa balana apata ahanna thiyenne pa්rashna 2 yi.
ma pambaagalakata patalunak men danuni.
ema darshanayata anuwa nawath kisindu aathmayak nomathi athara.
podi chithrapatayak penwannath lahasthi wenawa katha iwara wunata passe.
nirota ape upaharaya !!

inchiyon yenhuyi krikat kridanganayedi pawathi me tharagayedi bangladesha kantha krikat pila kasiye wasiya dina oowar 20kadi lakunu 95k labu athara shri lanka kridikawo oowar 18.2kadi lakunu 70kata dawi giyaha.prathiwadin adu lakunu gananakata dawi gos jayagrahanaya hambaa yamedi salasum sahagatha nowi durwala pithikaranayak penwima shri lankawa ran ho ridi padakkam dina ganime satana kara yamata pradhanathama badhakaya wiya.
thapassu balluka enakota mokakda kiyanne me indiyawe aya.
man koyitharam malshata rawatilada kiyala ruwan mata kiyala dunna.
me thathwaya thula, meki magula idiriyata gena yanneda nathda yanna gana nayakayan ekata wadi wi katha kirima athyawashya ya.
mese pawasimen ape sahruda blog karuwan ma mese pawasimen amanapa noweyayi sithami.

hambanthota waraya aashrithawa karmantha purayak gabada pahasukam wagema me aasannaye thattu 17 kin yuth paripalana godanagillak naw samagamwalata sewa sapayana aayathana aadi siyalu pahasukam salasena bawada kiweya.
sanwardhitha ratawal mula sita ma me sammuthiya mangin yojana wu kabandayoksayid wayu pita kirima sima kirimata wiruddha wiya.

2008 wasare sita gewi giya wasara 10 thula siduwu minis ghathana pilibanda jathika aarakshaka mandalayata idiripath kala warthawa penwa demin janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kale wathman aanduwa balayata pathwimen pasu minimarum saha aparadha ihala gos athi bawata atham madhya idiripath karana waradi madhya wartha atham deshapalanagnyayan da thama patu deshapalana aramunu wenuwen bhawitha karana bawayi.
samanya rimotayak me samaga thoraganna puluwan.

sathi anthaya arambaita pera sikurada dina kathanayaka karu jayasuriyata thanapathi karyalawalin hadisi durakathana amathum labemin thibune athiwi thibena deshapalana thaththwaya pilibanda sakachcha kirimataya.
eheth uu hamadama wage pare sitina dayal ekak nam uge charyawa monitar karana lesa dosthara theme illa sitinneya.
ee aruna ge waradakata nowe.
pipena pipena pohottu ayithi obalatamayi kiya sithapu kalaya awasan yayi sithanna kalaya elambaa atha.
mama dan ee minihata hirawela.
dina 100 ka ta balaya gath ejapaya masa 6 k balaye sitimin ape mathru bhumiyata kala winashaya elesayi.
mema bhithiya dewathmawadin thulin karanu labana pracharayak wana athara batahira lokaya ikmawa nagenahira lokaya aakramanaya kirimata tharam balawath bawath ehi thula atha.
mokakda pat eka cheappe ayiya gaminigen wimasiya.

shri lanka pila palamuwa pithiharambaayata 2011 agosthu 16 weni angaharuwada, 10:45 wadum: 310 chamara silwa ha shaminda eranga ada kandayamata shri lankawa ha ostreliyawa athara tharaga 5kin samanwitha ekdina tharagawaliye ada (16) hambanthota, suriyawawa mahinda rajapaksha antharjathika kridanganaye pawathwena thewani tharagaya me wanawita aarambha wi thibe.
kadulla asala padinchi tharuna nithignyayek mewara palathpalana chande ta idiripath wenawa.
dora gana dukayi....
borathel baralayak dolar 26yi.
monawa unath miniha giya eken maharagama tawuma pura fon ekakuth kane gahagena pissek..

thorathuru labaganimata ha prakasha kirimata athi hakiyawa shakthimath wana lesa sama shri lankikayekugema adahas prakasha kirime ayithiya thahawuru kirima pinisa madhya nidahasa surakshitha kala yuthu bawa,
mese kiya anathuruwa mese kiya.
ehema karapu mama me rata kisi kenakuta kisima dekata pawa denne naha.
kohomahari kiyawanna oone.
ema haskame ek nirmathruwarayek wuye me mapitigamaya.
mama noyekuth shailingen yuth githa gayana kalath ee athara wadipura thiyenne batahira shailiye githa.
-me ilipsakara pathaye wiwidha kotas haraha polowa gaman karanne ekama wegayakin nowe.
peradeniya wishwa widyalaye sisun siw deneku wisin eeye (05) rathriye mema thanayamata pamina mathpan panaya kirimen anathuruwa nomile kama illa siti bawa sandahanya.
issarahata ena dawas waladi athi tharan nindak laba ganna wena ekak nahayi kiyala man danan hitiya.
math kellek wela ipaduna nisa, samahara than waladi aasayi..eeth oya samhara kotu wuna welawata thama hithenne kollek wunanam kiyala..
kawuda ehema kiyanne..?
shri lankika tharunayin 5deneku engalanthayedi muhudata biliweyi
thawada ema ayithiwasikam pudgalayan athara pawathina wenaskam pilibandawa salakimakata lak nokara manushyayanwima nisa ma himiwi athi ayithiwasikam samudayak we.
bija wapirima - sakasagath paththiwala bija peliyata nodama eekakariwa bija wapirima kala hakiya.
namuth wathman janadhipathithumage gana wishwasaya thiyala laksha 15ka wadi chanda pramanayakin gotabhaya rajapaksha mathithuma janadhipathi karanna me rate janathawa katayuthu kala.
dakime kusalathawaya thiyenawa nam, eyata thamange sitha dakima apahasu wenne na.
mage danuma anuwa ek palliyak harenna winasha wu anek palli katholika
boho wita wayiras una wita penwana roga lakshana ,aathathiya , papu pedese wedanawa , miggran ho hise wedanawa wani roga lashana pennum kala haki we.
kalaniye indan, wanawasala pare gamunu hol eka langin mathuwela, migamu pare "yu ke" walata harena handiya gawa thabarumata thamayi kalaniye hama ekama bothalayak genna yanne.
lagadima ee gana oyalata subha aaranchiyak danum denna puluwan weyi kiyala hithanawa.ehenan api methanin nawathinnam.pa.li :- aa...godak ra wela. 18 wenidatath eliwela neda?
oonama ratak thamange rate thanathili sakas karanne thamange pandu yawannanta wasiwena widihata thamayi.
ema kalaya thula mema rapiyal dedahas pansiye watupa laba dimata apohosath wuwahoth wathukaraya pura wada warjanayak karanawa' yanuwenuyi ohu pawasuwe.
horakam karannata wuwa ratak thibiya yuthu ya
namuth ti.wi. eken palliwala githika balala thiyanawa.

ee dawaswala ofis eke thrimurthiya wage ekatama hitiye mamayi,siriyi,layanaluyi wadak nathi welawata api anik unwa bayit karamin awidinawa...dawal kamen passe thundena bristal widiyata gihin keselgedi kanna purudu wela hitiya...bristal widiye komarshal bankuwa langa aththikka gaha mula gaslabu saha keselgedi wikunana manussayek lallak dagena hitiya...dawasa purahama othanata ena aya minihagen palathuru kanawa saha aran yanawa...dawalta kattiya wadiyi,api thundenath gihin ambun hari aanamalu hari gedi thunak kala enawa...api hamadama yana nisa miniha apith ekka godak hithawath wunama api minihawath bayit karanna gaththa...siri thama patanganne, apata dennako kabayit dapu...

mema samagame ganudenu sambandhayen shri lanka maha bankuwe athireka adhyakshaka wasantha alwis mahatha siya adahas dakwuawasthawedi awasthawedi komisame sabhapathi ke.ti.chitha්rasiri mahatha melesa arjun alosiyas mahatha kadawana bawa danum dunneya.
(mama enawa oya ekka wada karannata.)
in pasu pawathi nadu wara walata mohu peni nositima nisa 2006/11/15 weni dina mema saman kumara yana ayata adhikaranayen warenthu nikuth kara thibe.
kammalikama amathaka kara ma boho welagena siruwata aduma mada gathimi.amma kiri ekath gena udata aawe ma sudanam wi pahalata bahinna hithaddimaya.
eda indalama thaththwaya meka thamayi.
"mashin hadanna" hari wal ekek ne ayiyo..
pasa nisaru karanawa wenuwata saru karana ranila kulaye mansha bhoga
ee nisa atham awasthawala sima thibima hanikarayi.
me bawa prakasha wuye 2016 pebarawari 10 wanada ...
rathri kalaye di dumriya wedikawe thanayama anthaye muthra karana pirimin sulabha dasunaki.kathakata ee pahasukamawath natha nawikaranayedi wasikili amathaka wima pudumayaki.

'sinhala buddhagama'ta erehiwa pala kerena oonama prakashanayak, deshanayak, kalakruthiyak pamanak nowa bana deshanayak wuwada apahasa lebalaya yatathe waranayata pamanak nowa dandanayata da lakwiya hakiya.
atham wita uda panimin prithi ghosha da pawathwanu atha.
gunadasa kapuge shurin wisin sangithaya nirmanaya kara gayana karana me githaya sandaha ohuge sangithaya menma katahanda da mana sadharanayak itu kara athayi sithami.
api hithamu demala jathika sandha­na­yath ekka ekathu wela aandu­wak hada­nawa kiyala.
kiyalath hithanna puluwani.
amarikawa pitasakwala jiwi thakshanaya pasugiya dashaka 04 thuladi laba gaththa bawa ohu anawaranaya kaleya.
me gatalu awama kara ganimata kisiyam ho buddhi mandalayaka sahaya athiwalokaye diyunu ratawala kramawedayanta anugatha wiya yuthuyi kiyala hithenawa
aluth parapurakata ayath wima nisama oonama manushyayekuta nisagayen ma uruma wana kawara ho nawa chinthanayak nomathi wanne keseda yannayi.
0.9 / juli 19, 2010; 4 wasara gananakata pera (2010-07-19)
daruwa eda… .
ape ammala nandalata tharan sadda katakwath wire nandata thibune na.
allah apata dayawa dakwa ginne wedanawen apa aaraksha kaleya.
kalu ledar andumakin sarasunu nekitanirupana shilpini nekita reshanige aluthma chayarupa ekathuwak pahathin narambaanna.
oya karakena kudu gana kathawath ada mage kathawata ekathu karaganna puluwan , mokada ada mama katha karanna inneth thawa honda “karakena kuduwak“ gana thamayi ...
ewan watapitawaka mema barapathala aparadhaye pradhana sakakaruwanta apa labima pamanak nowa rajaye aarakshaka anshawala nawatha thanathuruda laba di thibe.
nidarshabanayen angawenuye biya da diya haki wasthu ganaye wana bawa yi.
rugatha kirim nimawi rawula kapu pasu eelanga sinama pataya sandaha manasikawa sudanamwimata rajkumarta awashya wiya.
ek awasthawaka guwan yana pramadayak hethuwen mata singappuruwe dina kipayak nawathinna wuna.
manda mamada boho wita pariwarthanaya pamanak sidu karana bawini.
irida ema sambadhaka panawim pilibanda prathichara dakwu piyon yan palanaya pawasa thibune eya sinaha upadawana kisidu therumak nathi anathuru angawimak bawayi.
eeniya bahira wasthu manase nirmana, awashya nam anumana pamana ya.
sunil uba wage puththalam buruwekge katha kawuda wishwasa karanne ?

allas ho dushana wimarshana komisan sabhawe nawa adhyaksha janaralwariya lesa path karana lada dilrukshi dayas wikramasinha mahathmiya eeta adala pathwim lipiya ada (11) perawaruwe janadhipathi karyalaye di maithripala sirisena janapathiwaraya athin laba gaththaya.

athadanguwata pathwana sakakaruwangen pa්rakasha laba ganima sandaha owunta wadhahinsa paminawime purudda thawamath polisiya wisin mulumaninma athhara nomathi bawa eksath jathinge manawa himikam sanwidhanaya lankawe manawa himikam thaththwaya pilibandawa piliyela kala warthawaka sandahan weyi.
kar ekak ganna, geyak hadaganna bari tharam aarthike adiye inna minihekta me wage kenek dhanapathi panthiya wage penenna puluwan...
edina samahara muhunu dipaththimath wanu atha.
methanadi kale sarala wistharayak dirghawa gambaurata me gana danaganna kamathi kenekuta abhidharmaya hadarimen wadi wisthara labaganna puluwan.
kalekata passe thamange yalu mithrayan, nadayin balanda gamarata yana gamane uthkarshayen hamoma welila hitiya.
ee dennath eekata ekangawela dan itha paressamenlu kama bima ganne me kale thula.sathiyak withara gihin baluwama eka naluwekuge ina angal dekakata kittuwenna aduwela.
ampara muslim koththu kande siduwim pitupasa inne aanduwe deshapalanagnyayek.
aakasha wasthun dekehi sankalanaya oonama ayeku wisin bhawitha kala haki pudumakara pachchayak nirmanaya wi aththe ebawini.
eeth eekata aluth kali deka thunak ekathu wela thiyanawa.

sinhala rate pawathi sinhala gowithan ratawa mulinuputa dama debidi bija, thel, rasayanika pohora bhawitha karana aakru sanwidhanaye krutha්rima gowithan ratawa me rate palapadiyam karannata aakru sanwidhanayata awashya wiya.
ehen kimbaulek blog liyanna set una.

namuth anapekshithawa ee desin asunu shabdhayak nisa ee desa neth yomukala ma hata dakinnata labune neth adahagatha nohaki darshanayak...anda matha ela athi kuda redi kaballak matha udukuruwa howa athi kirikati bilindek thama nilwan deneth apa dedena desa yomagena sitiya...
kasada bandala aayemath mama prathikara ganna hamuda rohalata athulath wuna.
lahiru gana thawath aaranchi kshethraye pathira yanna gaththa.
mata kohomath sindu kiyanna puluwan.
ejapaya sillarata apekshakayo hoyagena chandeta dana athara shri lanipaya karanne apekshakayo hoyagena yana ekaya.

sanpreshana paddhathi palanaye saha aarakshanaye dosha sahagatha bawa nisa , balagara adhi barawi adala widuliya janana yanthra walata hani wimata yedena wita, eya madapawathwima pinisa adala balagara swayankriyawa wisandhi wima athyawashya deyaki.
enamuth mayiya ohu liya athi lipi bohomayak adhyanaya kirima kese wethath adu tharamin kiyawa ho bala thibenawa.
ema dinayema arjun saha nisha landan wetha yamata adahas karagena sitithi.
apita godak paduyi, ee kaleta hotale arina eka.

mita wasara 15 kata ihathadi siduwu el.ti.ti.ee. thrastha praharayan hethuwen thama samiyage penahaluwala thawamath yakada kabali athi bawath eheyin thama samiyata ashwasa kirima sandaha pirisidu wathashrayak nirantharayen awashya bawa waidyawaru nirdesha kara athi athara ee anuwa wayu samikaranayak bhawitha karana lesata upades di athi bawath pawasu fonseka mahathmiya pirisidu wathashraya nolabena lali walin aawaranaya kara athi kamaraya samiyata randawa thabaganima jiwithayata srujuwama tharjanayak ella kirimak bawath mehidi pawasuwaya.
oba aawata kamak na.
mawubimawath hariyata nodakkata duka hithenawa.
pahasukam kalamanakaranaya saha nadaththu kirima (126)
mama kamathi thamuseta warayak denna marenna issara wela...
irithalunu bimwala pawa
ee waga dutu aya ee bawak mawupiya aadinta aaranchiweya kiya biyen thathi gaththada?
" oya karanne na kiyala samanmali kiyapu de karala penwanna .
sthuthiyi muchalinda danuwath kalata.......
